trans-unit.source: Provides a description of modifications done to entities by operations returned in a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> object that contains a series of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse> objects, each of which contains a sequence of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor> or <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor> instances that represent persisted changes.

For successful operations, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A> property of the descriptor is set to unchanged and the new values for insert and update operations are merged according to the merge settings.

For operations with errors, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A> of the descriptor will remain the same as they were before <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> was called.
If an error occurred and processing stopped during an operation, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A> will remain unchanged.
A source entity in a link returned by a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
The identifier property of the source entity in a link returned by a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
The string identifier of an identity property in a source entity.
The source entity in a link returned by a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
